UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Design of embedded-hybrid antimicrobial peptides with enhanced cell selectivity and anti-biofilm activity.
Literature.Author: Xu W, Zhu X, Tan T, Li W, Shan A
